data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 943,584 believers in the state of Nord-Kivu into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nord-Kivu, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Nord-Kivu that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Nord-Kivu.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who are far from you in Nord-Kivu. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Nord-Kivu to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, provide a good translation of the Bible for the 943,584 believers in Nord-Kivu, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Nord-Kivu, Democratic Republic of the Congo that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.focus_label: Nord-Kivu, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary:
the state of Nord-Kivu, Democratic Republic of the Congo has a population of 4,908,800.

We estimate Nord-Kivu has 943,584 people who might know Jesus, 3,555,188 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 410,027 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.
